title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers:
Leigh Brackett, 
Lawrence Kasdan,
George Lucas
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
actors:
Keanu Reaves,
Laurence Fishburne,
Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
actors:
Mark Hamill,
Harrison Ford,
Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
actors:
Michael J. Fox,
Christopher Lloyd,
Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
actors:
Sigourney Weaver,
Tom Skerritt,
John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of th Lost Ark
writers:
Lawrence Kasdan, 
George Lucas, 
Philip Kaufman
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Karen Allen,
Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers:
Hampton Fancher, 
David Webb Peoples, 
Philip K. Dick
actors:
Harrison Ford, 
Rutger Hauer, 
Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers:
James Cameron,
Gale Anne Hurd,
William Wisher
actors:
Arnold Schwarzenegger, 
Linda Hamilton, 
Michael Biegn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
actors:
Cary Elwes,
Mandy Patinkin,
Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers:
Gene Roddenberry,
Jack B. Sowards,
Harve Bennett
actors:
William Shatner,
Leonard Nimoy,
DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Our Little Secret
actors: Hailey DeDominicis
shortDescription: Our Little Secret follows Avery (Lohan), who is spending her first Christmas with her boyfriend''s family but discovers her ex is also part of the holiday festivities and decides to hide their romantic history.

title: The Ghazi Attack
actors: Sankalp Reddy
shortDescription: Based on true events during the 1971 India-Pakistan war, a submarine crew fights to prevent a Pakistani naval attack.

title: Money Heist
actors: Pedro Alonso
shortDescription: A criminal mastermind plans the biggest heist in history � to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: Brooklyn
actors: Emory Cohen
shortDescription: An Irish immigrant navigates between two men and two countries, torn between her past in Ireland and her future in Brooklyn, New York.

title: Gone with the Wind
actors: Leslie Howard
shortDescription: A romantic and dramatic tale set during the American Civil War, centered on the love story between Scarlett O''Hara and Rhett Butler.

title: The Kid
actors: Charlie Chaplin
shortDescription: A tramp and an orphaned child form an unlikely partnership and develop a bond while struggling to survive in a tough world.

title: Coco
actors: Benjamin Bratt
shortDescription: A young boy embarks on a journey to the Land of the Dead to unlock the mysteries of his family''s history and legacy.

title: Spider-Man
actors: Cumberbatch
shortDescription: Spider-Man�s identity is revealed, and he seeks help from Doctor Strange to erase everyone''s memory of him, resulting in chaos across the multiverse.

title: Titanic
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet
shortDescription: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Inception
actors: Joseph Gordon-Levitt
shortDescription: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious is given the task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
